article_title: Healthcare Updates You Won't Want To Miss

article_metadata.description: Seniors can have a health savings account after all. The destruction of traditional health insurance is worse than we thought. And what about Obamacare’s success in reducing the uninsured? It’s all due to Medicaid expansion, rather than private insurance. And there’s more. If you’re a senior, you too can have a [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
